column9: Given to my 7 year old son by an Allergist and we have had excellent results.  Sometimes it makes him a bit grumpy, sometimes tired, but he is able to sleep better because he can breathe easier.  We take this during peek allergy season when his other meds are not working as well to relieve the congestion, and when he has a bad cold to help relieve some of his symptoms.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Caregiver)
column9: Works great on my six year old. Other decongestants make her grumpy and naughty.

column2: on Treatment for 10 years or more
column9: My 11 year old gets allergies that turns into a bad sinus infection.It works every time I give it to him.Within a few days he is much better.He is not crazy about the texture or taste,but over all it works.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: This was perscribed for my 4 year old son when he had broncitis. It didn't cause him drowsiness, nor did upset stomach occur. It treated his symptoms well.

column2: mom*of*3, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My 3.5 year old was prescribed this medication.  She was experiencing a double ear infection, conjuntivitis along with a major runny & congested nose.  This medication did wonders for her.  Within 24 hours her nose started clearing up and within 48 she could sleep without snoring.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: Was prescribed for my 8 yr. old son for a cough and stuffy nose.  It did nothing for the cough and made him unable to sleep. I do not recommend this drug.

column2: Love130, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My four year old son has seasonal allergies and this medication cures all symptoms. Ear, nose, and throat related sumptoms. Thanks for creating this one!

column2: momofthree, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Caregiver)
column9: My 5 year old daughter has been prescribed this med since she was 18 months old.  It works wonders on her.  She will have a running nose, water eyes, and itchy throat and in two doses she is a normal kid again.  When she first started taking the med she was very tired, but after the first prescription she was fine.  I never had any other problems with it.  She takes it before school in the AM with breakfast and at night after before bed.  She has never had a problem with being tired at school.  The medicine actually gives her back her energy after not feeling well.  I highly recommended this prescription.

column2: Cher, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: My 5 year old son and 2 year old daughter were perscribed this medicine and it made totally exhausted, grumpy, and Irritable. This is a terrible medicine to give to children.... Do not give this medicine if you can help it.

column2: 0-2 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: My 16 mmonth old daughter was prescribed this med.  It instantly made her exhausted, grumpy, and dizzy...REALLy dizzy  After 2 doses we stopped using the medication.
